EmailTemplate.subject: TEST: Heartfelt thanks from all of EDF
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As we approach the end of the year, I wanted to share with you this short message from EDF’s Executive Director, Amanda Leland, thanking you for your support in 2022.
I hope you will agree that it is a great summary of all we have achieved together this year towards ensuring a vital earth for everyone.
My heartfelt thanks to you for your partnership, and best wishes for the year to come.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Rhxx92Vaz8
Best,
Fred
Fred Krupp President Environmental Defense Fund
